mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Sure! Based on your preferences and budget, here's a suggested 5-day travel plan for you:

Day 1 - March 23, 2022 (Cedar Rapids to Denver)
- Mode of Transportation: Flight from Cedar Rapids to Denver
- Cost: $294 (Flight F3840860) or $207 (Flight F3840884)
- Duration: 1 hour 52 minutes or 1 hour 58 minutes
- Departure Time: 16:23 (Flight F3840860) or 13:11 (Flight F3840884)

Day 1 to Day 4 - March 23 to March 26, 2022 (Exploring Denver)
- Accommodation: The Oxford Hotel Downtown Denver (Approx. $350 per night for a standard room)
- Activities: Visit the Denver Art Museum, Red Rocks Park and Amphitheatre, Larimer Square, and take a day trip to Rocky Mountain National Park.

Day 4 - March 26, 2022 (Denver to Alamosa)
- Mode of Transportation: Flight from Denver to Alamosa
- Cost: $37 (Flight F3857649) or $78 (Flight F3857770)
- Duration: 0 hours 49 minutes
- Departure Time: 15:44 (Flight F3857649) or 07:42 (Flight F3857770)

Day 4 to Day 6 - March 26 to March 28, 2022 (Exploring Alamosa)
- Accommodation: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Alamosa (Approx. $150 per night for a standard room)
- Activities: Visit the Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve, Rio Grande Scenic Railroad, and Zapata Falls.

Day 6 - March 28, 2022 (Alamosa to Cedar Rapids)
- Mode of Transportation: Self-driving or taxi from Alamosa to Denver, then flight from Denver to Cedar Rapids
- Cost: $18 (self-driving), $377 (taxi) + $178 (Flight F3894390) from Denver to Cedar Rapids
or
$77 (self-driving), 1541 (taxi) from Alamosa to Cedar Rapids
- Duration: 3 hours 40 mins + 2 hours 6 mins (Flight F3894390) or 14 hours 27 mins (self-driving/taxi)

Total Cost:
- Flight: $294 (Cedar Rapids to Denver) + $37 (Denver to Alamosa) + $178 (Denver to Cedar Rapids) = $509
- Accommodation: 3 nights x $350 (Denver) + 2 nights x $150 (Alamosa) = $1,600
- Activities: Approx. $200 for all activities and meals
- Transportation: $18 (self-driving from Denver to Alamosa), $377 (taxi from Denver to Alamosa) or $77 (self-driving), 1541 (taxi) from Alamosa to Cedar Rapids = $1,962 or $1,818

Total Cost: $3,501 or $3,679

This itinerary includes flights, accommodation, transportation, and activities. The cost is within your budget of $4,300, leaving you some room for additional expenses or unexpected costs.
